page.title: 06GAMES AT TRELLECH SCHOOL.
page.content: IN THE PLAYGROUND WE PLAY GAMES.ONE OF OUR GAMES IS REDLETTER.IN REDLETTER SOMEBODY SAYS A LETTER.THIS LETTER IS THE REDLETTER.THEN THE PERSON WHO SAID THE REDLETTER SAYS ANOTHER LETTER,IF THE LETTER IS IN THE OTHER PERSON'S NAME THE AMOUNT OF TIMES THE LETTER IS IN THEIR NAMES IS THE AMOUNT OF STEPS THEY TAKE TOWARDS THE PERSON WHO SAID THE REDLETTER.IF THE PERSON WHO SAID THE REDLETTER SAYS THE REDLETTER AGAIN AND ITS IN THEIR NAMES AND THEY MOVE,THEYR'E OUT OF THE GAME.THE FIRST PERSON WHO GETS TO THE PERSON WHO SAID THE REDLETTER HAS WON. THE BOYS USUALLY PLAY FOOTBALL.IN FOOTBALL YOU HAVE A BALL WHICH YOU KICK INTO A GOAL.THE TEAM WITH THE MOST GOALS HAS WON.
